item.title: Rust on the WiFi Pineapple (and OpenWrt)
item.description: Over the holidays I wanted to get a very simple Rust application running on my WiFi Pineapple Nano. Since I don’t have much experience with embedded systems and cross-compilation, it sounded like something fun to do and I was sure I might learn a thing or two. Many hours later and lots of frustration, I ended up with a simple solution that I’d like to share in this post.
